data.caption: Clarification sought from Loyal Textile Mills Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Loyal Textile Mills Ltd on August 1, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
